body.minerDataWillBeCollected:
This service provides live measurement of the miner reachability and sealing pipeline.
It will automatically turn off when the miner is unreachable for more than 24 hours.

Once enabled, CIDgravity will keep track of the following information natively shared by boost :
body.sealingPipelineStatus: Total number of sectors by sector state
body.walletStatus: Balance of escrow, collateral and PubMsg addresses
body.testBeforeEnabling: Disable this feature at anytime from the settings menu.
